messages.subject: For the Love Of Jossilyn
messages.msgSnippet: I know several of you have been following the updates on Jossilyn and her family. A few have had updates already so you may have seen this twice. Yesterday at
messages.messageBody:
I know several of you have been following the updates on Jossilyn and her
family. A few have had updates already so you may have seen this twice.

Yesterday at 1:15 Jossilyn, age 9, past away. Jossilyn had been in the
hospital since January 31st. She had been fighting an infection and fever among
others the last few weeks and months. This was her second battle with AML, a
rare form of Leukemia since first diagnosed a couple years ago.
Jossilyn has 5 other siblings who live with their mom, Marge, here in Maine.

I have not had the chance to speak with her mother yet. Once we have
information on arrangements I will post it to the HUHO page below.

We will continue to leave the HUHO page up and the trust account "For the
Love Of Jossilyn" at Bank of America will remain open. (For those who wish
donate at Bank Of America you will need the fund name and "Trustee, Laura Drew"
if they cannot locate it.)

Thank you for all your well wishes for this little girl and the loving words
for her family. The kindness that has come from all over the US has been
amazing!

Feel free to contact me through this email or the email or toll free number
listed on the site below. Any suggestions, ideas or questions are welcome.

Laura Drew
_http://www.countrymoosekids.com/HUHO.html_
(http://www.countrymoosekids.com/HUHO.html)
note:We do not see credit cards numbers when paying through the site only
the buyers name and ship to info if item is purchased. All CC's are auto
processed by a computer.

To mail:
Marjorie Adams
P.O. Box 571
Anson, ME 04911
